title: Nutrium | Privacy Policy
content:
We use cookies to help you navigate efficiently and perform certain functions. You will find detailed information about all cookies under each consent category below.

The cookies that are categorized as "Necessary" are stored on your browser as they are essential for enabling the basic functionalities of the site. ... 

  • Cookie

    _nutrium_session

  • Duration

    session

  • Description

    _nutrium_session is used for session management for nutrium.com. It might hold information like user login status, preferences selected during the session, or other temporary data needed for the website's functionality during that session.

  • Cookie

    intercom-id-*

  • Duration

    8 months 26 days 1 hour

  • Description

    Intercom sets this cookie that allows visitors to see any conversations they've had on Intercom websites.

  • Cookie

    intercom-session-*

  • Duration

    7 days

  • Description

    Intercom sets this cookie that allows visitors to see any conversations they've had on Intercom websites.

  • Cookie

    intercom-device-id-*

  • Duration

    8 months 26 days 1 hour

  • Description

    Intercom sets this cookie that allows visitors to see any conversations they've had on Intercom websites.

  • Cookie

    XSRF-TOKEN

  • Duration

    10 minutes

  • Description

    Wix set this cookie for security purposes.

  • Cookie

    laravel_session

  • Duration

    10 minutes

  • Description

    Laravel uses laravel_session to identify a session instance for a user, this can be changed.

  • Cookie

    li_gc

  • Duration

    6 months

  • Description

    Linkedin set this cookie for storing visitor's consent regarding using cookies for non-essential purposes.

  • Cookie

    VISITOR_PRIVACY_METADATA

  • Duration

    6 months

  • Description

    The VISITOR_PRIVACY_METADATA cookie is used to store the user's cookie consent state for the current domain, which in this case is associated with YouTube. It tracks the consent given by the user for the use of cookies on the YouTube domain, ensuring that the user's privacy preferences are respected and applied in subsequent visits.

  • Cookie

    recent_write

  • Duration

    Less than a minute

  • Description

    The recent_write cookie tracks recent user actions or changes on the website, possibly related to writing or submitting data (like filling out a form, posting a comment, or similar interactive features). Given its very short lifespan, it manages or tracks a temporary state or recent action within the user's current session.

  • Cookie

    _GRECAPTCHA

  • Duration

    6 months

  • Description

    Google Recaptcha service sets this cookie to identify bots to protect the website against malicious spam attacks.

  • Cookie

    __cf_bm

  • Duration

    30 minutes

  • Description

    This cookie, set by Cloudflare, is used to support Cloudflare Bot Management.

  • Cookie

    __stripe_mid

  • Duration

    1 year

  • Description

    Stripe sets this cookie to process payments.

  • Cookie

    __stripe_sid

  • Duration

    1 hour

  • Description

    Stripe sets this cookie to process payments.

  • Cookie

    __Host-GAPS

  • Duration

    2 years

  • Description

    Google Accounts cookie used for logging in to our website with your Google account.

    This cookie also allows the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalisation.

  • Cookie

    poptin_previous_url

  • Duration

    2 minutes

  • Description

    The  poptin_previous_url cookie is used to store the URL of the previously visited page on your website. This can be useful for various functionalities such as redirecting users back to a previous page, understanding user navigation paths, or personalization purposes. Given its short lifespan of 2 minutes, it's used for immediate or near-immediate navigation purposes, rather than long-term tracking.

  • Cookie

    bscookie

  • Duration

    1 year

  • Description

    LinkedIn sets this cookie to store performed actions on the website.

  • Cookie

    lidc

  • Duration

    1 day

  • Description

    LinkedIn sets the lidc cookie to facilitate data center selection.

  • Cookie

    poptin_old_user

  • Duration

    2 days

  • Description

    Poptin sets this cookie to identify old users.

  • Cookie

    poptin_user_id

  • Duration

    1 year

  • Description

    Poptin sets this cookie to provide a unique visitor ID.

  • Cookie

    poptin_session

  • Duration

    1 hour

  • Description

    Poptin sets this cookie to save the Poptin session for its display settings.

  • Cookie

    gtm_id

  • Duration

    1 year

  • Description

    Google Tag Manager is a tag management system that allows for the easy implementation and management of tags (snippets of code) on a website without editing the code directly. Tags can be used for a variety of purposes, including tracking, analytics, marketing, and more. The gtm_id cookie might be used by Google Tag Manager to manage the deployment of different tags on intercom.com. This could involve keeping track of which tags have been activated, user preferences regarding the tags, or other tag management functions.

  • Cookie

    loom_anon_comment

  • Duration

    1 year

  • Description

    The loom_anon_comment  cookie is used for anonymous commenting features on videos hosted by Loom. It could be tracking user interactions or preferences associated with commenting on Loom videos.

  • Cookie

    loomhq:thirdPartyCookieSupported

  • Duration

    session

  • Description

    The  loomhq:thirdPartyCookieSupported  cookie is used to check or indicate whether third-party cookies are supported or enabled in the user's browser. This functionality can be important for websites that rely on third-party services or integrations that use cookies.

  • Cookie

    VISITOR_INFO1_LIVE

  • Duration

    6 months

  • Description

    YouTube sets this cookie to measure bandwidth, determining whether the user gets the new or old player interface.

  • Cookie

    yt-remote-device-id

  • Duration

    never

  • Description

    YouTube sets this cookie to store the user's video preferences using embedded YouTube videos.

  • Cookie

    yt-remote-connected-devices

  • Duration

    never

  • Description

    YouTube sets this cookie to store the user's video preferences using embedded YouTube videos.

  • Cookie

    amplitude_cookie_test

  • Duration

    session

  • Description

    Amplitude sets this cookie, which is used to uniquely identify the user's machine.

  • Cookie

    _hjTLDTest

  • Duration

    session

  • Description

    To determine the most generic cookie path that has to be used instead of the page hostname, Hotjar sets the _hjTLDTest cookie to store different URL substring alternatives until it fails.

  • Cookie

    wp-wpml_current_language

  • Duration

    session

  • Description

    WordPress multilingual plugin sets this cookie to store the current language/language settings.

  • Cookie

    _ga

  • Duration

    1 year 1 month 4 days

  • Description

    Google Analytics sets this cookie to calculate visitor, session and campaign data and track site usage for the site's analytics report. The cookie stores information anonymously and assigns a randomly generated number to recognise unique visitors.

  • Cookie

    _gid

  • Duration

    1 day

  • Description

    Google Analytics sets this cookie to store information on how visitors use a website while also creating an analytics report of the website's performance. Some of the collected data includes the number of visitors, their source, and the pages they visit anonymously.

  • Cookie

    _gat_UA-*

  • Duration

    1 minute

  • Description

    Google Analytics sets this cookie for user behaviour tracking.

  • Cookie

    amplitude_id_*

  • Duration

    1 year 1 month 4 days

  • Description

    Amplitude sets this cookie, which is used to uniquely identify the user's machine.

  • Cookie

    _ga_*

  • Duration

    1 year 1 month 4 days

  • Description

    Google Analytics sets this cookie to store and count page views.

  • Cookie

    AnalyticsSyncHistory

  • Duration

    1 month

  • Description

    Linkedin set this cookie to store information about the time a sync took place with the lms_analytics cookie.

  • Cookie

    _hjIncludedInSessionSample_1530397

  • Duration

    1 hour

  • Description

    Hotjar cookies with names starting with _hj are typically used for understanding user behavior on websites. 

  • Cookie

    instap-spid.9d29

  • Duration

    1 year 1 month 4 days

  • Description

    The instap-spid.* cookie type is used to set the domain_userid, which is a unique identifier for a user on a particular domain.

  • Cookie

    loom_referral_video

  • Duration

    session

  • Description

    The  loom_referral_video cookie is used to identify when a user visits the website via a referral that involves Loom's video player. This could be useful for understanding the effectiveness of video content as a referral source and optimizing the placement or promotion of such content.

  • Cookie

    __Host-psifi.analyticsTrace

  • Duration

    6 hours

  • Description

    The __Host-psifi.analyticsTrace cookie is designed to collect statistical data on how users interact with the website. This includes tracking user actions, navigation patterns, and other behavioural metrics.

  • Cookie

    __Host-psifi.analyticsTraceV2

  • Duration

    6 hours

  • Description

    Similar to its predecessor, this cookie is designed to collect statistical data on how users interact with the website. This includes tracking various user actions, navigation patterns, and overall engagement with the site.

  • Cookie

    _lfa

  • Duration

    1 year

  • Description

    This cookie is set by the provider Leadfeeder to identify the IP address of devices visiting the website, in order to retarget multiple users routing from the same IP address.

  • Cookie

    _gat_gtag_UA_*

  • Duration

    1 minute

  • Description

    Google Analytics sets this cookie to store a unique user ID.

  • Cookie

    _hjSessionUser_*

  • Duration

    1 year

  • Description

    Hotjar sets this cookie to ensure data from subsequent visits to the same site is attributed to the same user ID, which persists in the Hotjar User ID, which is unique to that site.

  • Cookie

    _hjFirstSeen

  • Duration

    1 hour

  • Description

    Hotjar sets this cookie to identify a new user’s first session. It stores the true/false value, indicating whether it was the first time Hotjar saw this user.

  • Cookie

    _hjSession_*

  • Duration

    1 hour

  • Description

    Hotjar sets this cookie to ensure data from subsequent visits to the same site is attributed to the same user ID, which persists in the Hotjar User ID, which is unique to that site.

  • Cookie

    CONSENT

  • Duration

    2 years

  • Description

    YouTube sets this cookie via embedded YouTube videos and registers anonymous statistical data.

  • Cookie

    ajs_anonymous_id

  • Duration

    1 year

  • Description

    This cookie is set by Segment to count the number of people who visit a certain site by tracking if they have visited before.

  • Cookie

    ajs_user_id

  • Duration

    never

  • Description

    This cookie is set by Segment to help track visitor usage, events, target marketing, and also measure application performance and stability.

  • Cookie

    _hjAbsoluteSessionInProgress

  • Duration

    1 hour

  • Description

    Hotjar sets this cookie to detect a user's first pageview session, which is a True/False flag set by the cookie.

  • Cookie

    _hjIncludedInSessionSample_*

  • Duration

    1 hour

  • Description

    Hotjar cookies with names starting with _hj are typically used for understanding user behavior on websites.

  • Cookie

    instap-spses.*

  • Duration

    1 hour

  • Description

    Snowplow is an analytics platform that provides detailed insights into user behaviour on websites. The instap-spses.* cookie, being a session cookie set by Snowplow, is used to count and track visitor sessions on the client side.

  • Cookie

    instap-spid.*

  • Duration

    1 year 1 month 4 days

  • Description

    The instap-spid.* cookie type is used to set the domain_userid, which is a unique identifier for a user on a particular domain.

  • Cookie

    _gat

  • Duration

    1 minute

  • Description

    Google Universal Analytics sets this cookie to restrain request rate and thus limit data collection on high-traffic sites.

  • Cookie

    YSC

  • Duration

    session

  • Description

    Youtube sets this cookie to track the views of embedded videos on Youtube pages.

  • Cookie

    test_cookie

  • Duration

    15 minutes

  • Description

    doubleclick.net sets this cookie to determine if the user's browser supports cookies.

  • Cookie

    muc_ads

  • Duration

    1 year 1 month 4 days

  • Description

    Twitter sets this cookie to collect user behaviour and interaction data to optimize the website.

  • Cookie

    personalization_id

  • Duration

    1 year 1 month 4 days

  • Description

    Twitter sets this cookie to integrate and share features for social media and also store information about how the user uses the website, for tracking and targeting.

  • Cookie

    MUID

  • Duration

    1 year 24 days

  • Description

    Bing sets this cookie to recognise unique web browsers visiting Microsoft sites. This cookie is used for advertising, site analytics, and other operations.

  • Cookie

    li_sugr

  • Duration

    3 months

  • Description

    LinkedIn sets this cookie to collect user behaviour data to optimise the website and make advertisements on the website more relevant.

  • Cookie

    bcookie

  • Duration

    1 year

  • Description

    LinkedIn sets this cookie from LinkedIn share buttons and ad tags to recognize browser IDs.

  • Cookie

    poptin_c_visitor

  • Duration

    1 month

  • Description

    Poptin sets this cookie to determine which ads the visitor should be shown and ensure that the same ads do not get shown more than intended.

  • Cookie

    _gcl_au

  • Duration

    3 months

  • Description

    Google Tag Manager sets the cookie to experiment advertisement efficiency of websites using their services.

  • Cookie

    _fbp

  • Duration

    3 months

  • Description

    Facebook sets this cookie to display advertisements when either on Facebook or on a digital platform powered by Facebook advertising after visiting the website.

  • Cookie

    UserMatchHistory

  • Duration

    1 month

  • Description

    LinkedIn sets this cookie for LinkedIn Ads ID syncing.

  • Cookie

    _uetsid

  • Duration

    1 day

  • Description

    Bing Ads sets this cookie to engage with a user that has previously visited the website.

  • Cookie

    _uetvid

  • Duration

    1 year 24 days

  • Description

    Bing Ads sets this cookie to engage with a user that has previously visited the website.

  • Cookie

    __tld__

  • Duration

    session

  • Description

    The __tld__ cookie is used for tracking user behaviour across multiple websites. This kind of tracking is typically employed to gather data on user interests and online behaviour, which is then used to present targeted advertisements.

  • Cookie

    IDE

  • Duration

    1 year 24 days

  • Description

    Google DoubleClick IDE cookies store information about how the user uses the website to present them with relevant ads according to the user profile.

  • Cookie

    yt.innertube::requests

  • Duration

    never

  • Description

    YouTube sets this cookie to register a unique ID to store data on what videos from YouTube the user has seen.

  • Cookie

    yt.innertube::nextId

  • Duration

    never

  • Description

    YouTube sets this cookie to register a unique ID to store data on what videos from YouTube the user has seen.

  • Cookie

    NID

  • Duration

    6 months

  • Description

    Google sets the cookie for advertising purposes; to limit the number of times the user sees an ad, to unwanted mute ads, and to measure the effectiveness of ads.

  • Cookie

    fr

  • Duration

    3 months

  • Description

    Facebook sets this cookie to show relevant advertisements by tracking user behaviour across the web, on sites with Facebook pixel or Facebook social plugin.

Last update: January 1st 2025

Nutrium's Privacy Policy - Professional

Nutrium's Privacy Policy - Client

Get started today!

If you can make a list or send an email, you can use Nutrium. Starting an appointment is really that simple.

excerpt: Nutrium is a nutrition software solution in the cloud therefore we made sure that this policy is as transparent, clear and concise as possible.
